official_title: To establish limitation with respect to the disclosure and use of genetic information by life and disability insurers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Genetic Protection in Insurance Coverage Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Genetic Protection in Insurance Coverage Act - Sets forth a limitation on the disclosure and use of genetic information by life and disability insurers.

titles.title: Genetic Protection in Insurance Coverage Act
To establish limitation with respect to the disclosure and use of genetic information by life and disability insurers, and for other purposes.
